name: multiagent-mcp-server
description: Production-ready multi-agent MCP server for automated codebase review, documentation generation, and quality assurance
author: Arpit-Moga

tools.name: issue_detection_review
tools.description: Run unified issue detection analysis on the specified code directory

code_directory.description: Path to code directory to analyze (default: current working directory)

output_directory.description: Path to write output files (default: code_directory/DOCUMENTATION)

output_format.description: Output format - 'md' for markdown or 'json' for JSON

scan_mode.description: Scan mode - 'quick' (fastest tools only) or 'deep' (all tools + LLM)

tools.name: documentation_generate
tools.description: Generate comprehensive documentation for the specified code directory

code_directory.description: Path to code directory to analyze (default: current working directory)

output_directory.description: Path to write output files (default: code_directory/DOCUMENTATION)

tools.name: comprehensive_review
tools.description: Run all agents on the specified code directory for comprehensive analysis

code_directory.description: Path to code directory to analyze (default: current working directory)

output_directory.description: Path to write output files (default: code_directory/DOCUMENTATION)

output_format.description: Output format - 'md' for markdown or 'json' for JSON

scan_mode.description: Scan mode - 'quick' (fastest tools only) or 'deep' (all tools + LLM)

resources.name: analysis-reports
resources.description: Generated analysis reports with issues and recommendations

resources.name: documentation-files
resources.description: Generated documentation files (README, API docs, etc.)
